languages.text: {n}Ксенос обнажает клинок и со свистом рассекает воздух у шеи Кассии. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Камень, что все это время был сплавлен с телом Леди-Навигатора{/d}, разрывает тонкую кожу и падает под ноги Арлекина.{/n} "Я польщен, что отчаявшийся мон-кай с тьмой в глазах все же смог передать тебе мой подарок. Но я более не вижу в нем нужды".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос обнажает клинок и со свистом рассекает воздух у шеи Кассии. Камень, что все это время был сплавлен с телом Леди-Навигатора, разрывает тонкую кожу и падает под ноги Арлекина.{/n} "Я польщен, что отчаявшийся мон-кай с тьмой в глазах все же смог передать тебе мой подарок. Но я более не вижу в нем нужны".

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос обнажает клинок и со свистом рассекает воздух у шеи Кассии. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Камень, что все это время был сплавлен с телом Леди-Навигатора{/d}, разрывает тонкую кожу и падает под ноги Арлекина.{/n} "Я польщен, что отчаявшийся мон-кай с тьмой в глазах все же смог передать тебе мой подарок. Но я более не вижу в нем нужды".

The stone that was fused with her body tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you after all. But I see no further need for it."

But I no longer see the need for it."

The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは刃を抜くとカシアの首めがけて大気を切り裂く。彼女の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}身体と融合していた石は肌を裂かれてハーレクィンの足下に落ちる{/d}{/n}「奴の瞳の暗さに絶望するモン＝ケイが、僕からの贈り物をキミに渡したことに感動しちゃった。でも、もう意味ないと思うんだよね」
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは刃を抜くとカシアの首めがけて大気を切り裂く。彼女の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}身体と融合していた石は肌を裂かれてハーレクィンの足下に落ちる{/d}{/n}「奴の瞳の暗さに絶望するモン＝ケイが、僕からの贈り物をキミに渡したことに感動しちゃった。でも、もう意味ないと思うんだよね」

languages.text: {n}丑角拔出利刃，划过了卡西娅脖子旁边的空气。原本{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}与她的身体融为一体的石头{/d}撕开了她的皮肤，掉在了丑角脚下。{/n}“那个眼神充满黑暗的猴子，真的把我的礼物交给了你，我很感动，但我现在已经不需要它了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角拔出利刃，划过了卡西娅脖子旁边的空气。原本与她的身体融为一体的石头撕开了她的皮肤，掉在了丑角脚下。{/n}“那个眼神充满黑暗的猴子，真的把我的礼物交给了你，我很感动。不过我认为，这件礼物如今已经不再需要了。”

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin dégaine son arme et tranche l'air autour du cou de Cassia. La {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}pierre incrustée dans son corps{/d} déchire alors sa peau et vient tomber à ses pieds.{/n} « Je suis touché que le mon-keigh aux yeux sombres vous ait transmis mon présent, mais vous n'en avez plus besoin. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin dégaine son arme et tranche l'air autour du cou de Cassia. La pierre incrustée dans son corps déchire alors sa peau et vient tomber aux pieds de l'arlequin.{/n} « Je suis touché que le mon-keigh aux yeux sombres vous ait transmis mon présent, mais vous n'en avez plus besoin. »

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín desenvaina su espada y corta el aire junto al cuello de Cassia. La {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}piedra que estaba fundida con su cuerpo{/d} atraviesa su piel y cae a los pies del Arlequín.{/n} «Me emociona ver que el mon-keigh desesperado con oscuridad en los ojos llegó a entregarte mi regalo, después de todo, mas ahora ya es prescindible».
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín desenvaina su espada y corta el aire junto al cuello de Cassia. La piedra que estaba fundida con su cuerpo atraviesa su piel y cae a los pies del Arlequín.{/n} «Me emociona ver que el mon-keigh desesperado con oscuridad en los ojos llegó a entregarte mi regalo, después de todo, mas ahora ya es prescindible».

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin zieht seine Klinge und durchtrennt die Luft unmittelbar neben Cassias Hals. Der {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Stein, der mit ihrem Körper verschmolzen war{/d}, bricht durch ihre Haut und fällt dem Harlekin vor die Füße.{/n} "Ich bin berührt, dass der verzweifelte Chem-Pan-Sey mit der Dunkelheit in den Augen Euch mein Geschenk doch noch übergeben hat. Aber ich sehe keine Notwendigkeit dafür mehr."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin zieht seine Klinge und durchtrennt die Luft unmittelbar neben Cassias Hals. Der Stein, der mit ihrem Körper verschmolzen war, bricht durch ihre Haut und fällt dem Harlekin vor die Füße.{/n} "Ich bin berührt, dass der verzweifelte Chem-Pan-Sey mit der Dunkelheit in den Augen Euch mein Geschenk doch noch übergeben hat. Aber ich sehe keinen Sinn mehr darin, es zu haben."

{n}Der Harlekin zieht seine Klinge und durchtrennt die Luft unmittelbar neben Cassias Hals. Der Stein, der mit ihrem Körper verschmolzen war, bricht durch ihre Haut und fällt dem Harlekin vor die Füße.{/n} "Ich bin berührt, dass der verzweifelte Chem-Pan-Sey mit der Dunkelheit in den Augen Euch mein Geschenk doch noch übergeben hat. Aber ich sehe keine Notwendigkeit dafür mehr."

languages.text: {n}Arleken, kılıcını çekip Cassia'nın boynunun hemen önündeki havayı kesiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Cassia'nın vücuduyla kaynaşmış taş{/d}, Rotacı'nın cildini yırtarak Arleken'in ayaklarının dibinde yere düşüyor.{/n} "Gözlerini karanlığın bürüdüğü, çaresiz mon-keigh'in her şeye rağmen hediyemi sana iletmesi beni duygulandırdı. Lakin artık buna ihtiyacım yok."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin draws his blade and slashes the air right by Cassia's neck. The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone that was fused with her body{/d} tears through her skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "I am touched that the desperate mon-keigh with darkness in his eyes passed my gift to you, after all. But I no longer see the need for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken kılıcını çekip Cassia'nın boynunun hemen yanındaki havayı kesiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Cassia'nın vücuduyla kaynaşmış taş{/d}, Cassia'nın cildini yırtarak Arleken'in ayaklarının dibinde yere düşüyor.{/n} "Gözlerini karanlığın bürüdüğü çaresiz mon-keighin her şeye rağmen hediyemi sana iletmesi, beni duygulandırdı. Lakin artık buna ihtiyacım yok."
